tasks.name: Defrost
tasks.description: Power off your freezer and let the ice build up melt.

tasks.name: Clean condenser coils
tasks.description: Vacuum or wipe dust and debris from the condensor coils.

tasks.name: Check door gasket
tasks.description: Clean food residue off the door gasket and make sure it's tight.

tasks.name: Change ice maker filter
tasks.description: Change the water filter in your ice maker.

tasks.name: Change water dispenser filter
tasks.description: Change the water filter in your water dispenser.

tasks.name: Clean under the hood
tasks.description: Lift the cooktop to clean any food particles or grease buildup beneath it.

tasks.name: Wash burner drip plates
tasks.description: Remove and wash burner drip plates, or replace them if they are corroded.

tasks.name: Clean knobs
tasks.description: Remove control panel knobs and clean around the bases.

tasks.name: Clean
tasks.description: Inspect gutters for debris and remove.

tasks.name: Inspect for leaks
tasks.description: Check gutters for leaks and repair.

tasks.name: Clean showerhead
tasks.description: Clean showerheads to remove mineral deposits.

tasks.name: Inspect drain
tasks.description: Inspect the drain for clogs or buildup and remove.

tasks.name: Descale
tasks.description: Run a cleaning solution through your hot water heater to clean mineral deposits.

tasks.name: Check for leaks
tasks.description: Inspect for leaking water or signs of moisture around the unit.

tasks.name: Check shingles
tasks.description: Check for missing, curling, or cracking shingles and replace.

tasks.name: Clean
tasks.description: Clean off dirt, mildew, stains, and other elements.

tasks.name: Check shingles
tasks.description: Check for missing, curling, or cracking shingles and replace.

tasks.name: Clean trap
tasks.description: Remove and clean the trap in the bottom of your dishwasher.

tasks.name: Sanitize
tasks.description: Put vinegar or cleaning solution in and run a hot water cycle to sanitize and deodorize.

tasks.name: Clean sprayer arm
tasks.description: Check holes in sprayer arms for debris and dried soap and clean if needed.
